outline:
1. to act unfaithfully, act treacherously, transgress, commit a trespass
    1. (Qal) to act unfaithfully or treacherously
      1. against man
      2. against God
      3. against devoted thing
      4. against husband
strongs_def: properly, to cover up; used only figuratively, to act covertly, i.e. treacherously
